body:
Terraria ≠ Minecraft.
Terraria is a sandbox game (yes like Minecraft) but there is more Adventure and Action in it. This is a thread where you could discuss about your world and perhaps meet some other people who play the game too. 

Does anyone have this game? If so, could you add me on Steam, my username is Satifying_. 
If we get enough people we could create a Avicus on Terraria :)

title: Terraria Thread ^_^

replies.body: Dude, you are going to make a lot of people mad. Good luck grasshopper.
replies.body_tagged: Dude, you are going to make a lot of people mad. Good luck grasshopper.

replies.body: I love Terraria! It was the first real game I ever owned! (I had it before Minecraft). Let me just say, I don't like how the new swords have a "true" variant that shoots out an essence of the sword.
replies.body_tagged: I love Terraria! It was the first real game I ever owned! (I had it before Minecraft). Let me just say, I don't like how the new swords have a "true" variant that shoots out an essence of the sword.

replies.body:
Terrira single player is better then mine craft.

It's reversed when talked about multiplayer.  I have about 230 hours on the game.
